pullRequest.title: Query Verification: Support for multiple table schema and ddl
pullRequest.bodyText: Implemented data free verification for schema provided in DDL and support for schema files consisting of multiple tables.

commit.message: Support for multiple table schema and ddl
improved error handling in reading json schema

nodes.bodyText: Does the schema job not return information about the table created that we can use here instead of reparsing the mgiratedSchema?
